amendment.description: Amendment reduces the EPA's Environmental Programs and Management (Greenhouse Gas Registry) account by $8,458,000 and applies the amount to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 84 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the Environmental Protection Agency, Environmental Programs and Management account by $8,458,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A037) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 185 (Roll no. 64).
